text: {"score": 0.1, "pass": false, "rationale": "The candidate answer uses completely incorrect legal provisions (StGB Art. 139, SVG Art. 55, 56, 57, 58, StGB Art. 125, 252, BetmG Art. 2, 3, 4, AuG Art. 10, 12) instead of the correct Swiss Federal Road Traffic Act (SVG), Narcotics Act (BetmG), and Foreign Nationals Act (AuG) provisions cited in the reference answer (e.g., SVG 95, 91, 90 IV, 92, BetmG 19, AuG 116). The analysis of the facts is therefore based on a wrong legal framework, leading to a fundamentally incorrect assessment of the criminal liability for both Paul and Rosa. For example, the reference correctly identifies Fahren ohne Berechtigung (SVG 95), Fahren in nichtfahrf√§higem Zustand (SVG 91), and qualifiziert grobe Verkehrsregelverletzung (SVG 90 IV) for Paul, none of which are correctly identified by the candidate.
